statements: SELECT * FROM policyholder_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholder_info WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info WHERE age < 40 ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM policyholder_info WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, contact_details FROM policyholder_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT id, name, age FROM policyholder_info WHERE name LIKE '%John%' AND age < 50;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholder_info WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM policyholder_info;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info WHERE contact_details IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholder_info ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM policyholder_info WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_address WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT policyholder_id, city, state FROM policyholder_address WHERE zipcode = '10001';
SELECT name, age, contact_details FROM policyholder_info WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT id, name, age, contact_details FROM policyholder_info WHERE name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM policyholder_info JOIN policyholder_address ON policyholder_info.id = policyholder_address.policyholder_id WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT name, age, contact_details FROM policyholder_info WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND contact_details IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age FROM policyholder_info;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholders ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT policy_type, policy_amount FROM policies WHERE policy_amount > 10000;
SELECT name, contact_details FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT p.policy_type, ph.name FROM policies p JOIN policy_holder_policies php ON p.policy_id = php.policy_id JOIN policyholders ph ON php.policyholder_id = ph.id;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;

SELECT policyholders.name, policies.policy_type, policies.policy_amount FROM policyholders JOIN policy_holder_policies ON policyholders.id = policy_holder_policies.policyholder_id JOIN policies ON policy_holder_policies.policy_id = policies.policy_id;

SELECT policy_holders.name AS PolicyholderName, policies.policy_type AS PolicyType, policies.policy_amount AS PolicyAmount FROM policyholders AS policy_holders JOIN policy_holder_policies ON policy_holders.id = policy_holder_policies.policyholder_id JOIN policies ON policy_holder_policies.policy_id = policies.policy_id WHERE policies.policy_amount > 5000;

SELECT policyholders.name AS PolicyholderName, policyholders.age AS PolicyholderAge, policy_holder_policies.relationship_id AS RelationshipID, policies.policy_type AS PolicyType, policies.policy_amount AS PolicyAmount FROM policyholders JOIN policy_holder_policies ON policyholders.id = policy_holder_policies.policyholder_id JOIN policies ON policy_holder_policies.policy_id = policies.policy_id WHERE policyholders.age < 40;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries ORDER BY relationship DESC;
SELECT policyholder_id, policy_type, policy_start_date FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health';
SELECT policyholder_id, policy_type, policy_start_date, policy_end_date FROM policies ORDER BY policy_end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policyholders;
SELECT name, age FROM policyholders WHERE age > 30;
SELECT policyholder_id, policy_type FROM policies WHERE policy_start_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT policy_id, claim_amount FROM claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT beneficiary_name, relationship FROM beneficiaries WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders;
SELECT name, age FROM Policyholders ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT policy_type, start_date FROM Policies WHERE policyholder_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount FROM Claims WHERE claim_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT agent_name, commission FROM Agents WHERE commission > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM Policyholders
SELECT name, age FROM Policyholders WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT Policies.policy_id, Policies.policy_type, Policyholders.name FROM Policies INNER JOIN Policyholders ON Policies.policyholder_id = Policyholders.policyholder_id

SELECT Payments.payment_id, Payments.payment_amount, Claims.claim_id FROM Payments INNER JOIN Claims ON Payments.claim_id = Claims.claim_id WHERE Payments.payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY Payments.payment_amount DESC
SELECT DISTINCT Policies.policy_type FROM Policies
